message: Let's split the money 60/40.  It's important to settle this quickly because of inflation.
Your offer was a bit unfair.  Let's be reasonable and split it more evenly this time.

Bob, let's be realistic.  The value of this money decreases with every round.  My turn, your turn - it's only going to shrink. I'm offering you 45 which is a better deal than what you'll get if we don't settle now.
